## [esquisse add-in](https://github.com/dreamRs/esquisse)

Added Feb 2nd, 2022

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from site:** This addin allows you to interactively explore your data by visualizing it with the ggplot2 package.
It allows you to draw bar plots, curves, scatter plots, histograms, boxplot and sf objects, then export the graph or retrieve the code to reproduce the graph.

See online documentation: <https://dreamrs.github.io/esquisse/index.html>
